text.text_translated:
It is very important to know about different expectations and actions. This can help us avoid miscommunication. Miscommunication means when people do not understand each other. Stereotypes are simple ideas about groups of people. We must remember that stereotypes are very bad for good business relationships.

National cultures can make us act and think in certain ways. But many other things also affect us. The place where we live affects us. The people we are with affect us. Our age affects us. Our gender affects us. Our corporate culture affects us. Our individual experiences affect us.

So, we know about these differences. We should remember them. But we must not use this knowledge to judge all people from one country in the same way.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Knowing more about different expectations helps us. Knowing more about different actions helps us. This helps us avoid problems. We can avoid not understanding each other.
But we must also remember this. Stereotypes are bad. (Stereotypes are simple ideas about groups of people.) They can stop us from having good business relationships.
Our country's culture can change how we act and think. But many other things also change us. The place we live changes us. The groups of people we are with change us. Our age changes us. If we are a man or a woman changes us. Our company's culture changes us. Our own life experiences change us.
So, we know about these differences. We should remember them. But we must not use this knowledge to think all people from one country are the same.
